articles.title: Conor McGregor knocks out Heat mascot in bizarre promotion at NBA Finals - The Associated Press
articles.description: MIAMI (AP) — Former UFC champion Conor McGregor knocked out the Miami Heat mascot in a midgame bit that went wrong. Burnie — more specifically, the man who occupies Burnie's costume — briefly sought medical attention Friday night after taking two punches from…
